DOC.brief_summary: Exploratory study double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled , full cross-over design . The main objective identify one two flour composition carbohydrate-based food produce significant difference ( alpha =0.2 ) time reach 50 % cumulative absorption exogenous glucose compare control .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Different Flour Compositions Carbohydrate-based Food Rate Exogenous Glucose Appearance Blood
DOC.detailed_description: Twelve volunteer participate study ; person study three different occasion least one week apart , consume three different test product randomize order . Test product carbohydrate-based food make different flour mix differ expect rate intestinal starch digestion . The product label 13C starch .
DOC.criteria: healthy male Age start study ≥18 ≤ 50 year Not smoke Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 20 ≤ 28 kg/m2 Fasting blood glucose value volunteer ≥ 3.4 ≤ 6.1 mmol/litre ( i.e . 62110 mg/dl ) screening
